questions.question: In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face off against a Warlord of the Sea who rules over a kingdom in the sky. What is...?
This arc revolves around Luffy and his crew's involvement in a massive conflict against Kaido and his forces. What is...?
This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' journey to an underwater island and their encounter with a fish-man supremacist group. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability grants the power to transform into a hybrid and full giraffe form. What is...?
questions.answer: Ushi Ushi no Mi, Model: Giraffe

questions.question: This power is used to harden the body and weapons, increasing their offensive and defensive capabilities. What is...?
This technique, used by Brook, allows him to extract and manipulate the souls of others. What is...?
This character, a member of the Worst Generation, possesses the ability to create a 'Room' and manipulate objects and people within it. Who is...?
This new character, introduced in the Wano Country arc, is known for their claim to be the son of Kaido and for their mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit. Who is...?
This character, a former Revolutionary Army commander, is known for his ability to create destructive earthquakes with the Gura Gura no Mi. Who is...?
